clinical_history: Patient with chronic dyspnea and smoking history.
findings: Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 14 mm in diameter.
Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in left upper lobe.
Well-defined nodule measuring 11 mm in left upper lobe.
Mediastinal widening observed with soft tissue density.
Collapse of left upper lobe lobe with volume loss.
Bronchiectatic changes in left upper lobe region.
recommendations: Clinical correlation advised; refer to pulmonologist.
